00025 #include "OgreDynLibManager.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreDynLib.h"
00028 
00029 namespace Ogre
00030 {
00031     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00032     template<> DynLibManager* Singleton<DynLibManager>::ms_Singleton = 0;
00033     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 
00035     DynLib* DynLibManager::load( const String& filename, int priority /* = 1 */ )
00036     {        
00037         DynLib* pLib = static_cast<DynLib *>( getByName( filename ) );
00038 
00039         if( !pLib )
00040         {
00041             pLib = static_cast<DynLib *>( create( filename ) );
00042             ResourceManager::load(pLib, priority);
00043         }
00044         
00045         return pLib;
00046     }
00047 
00048     Resource* DynLibManager::create( const String& name )
00049     {
00050         return new DynLib( name );
00051     }
00052     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00053     DynLibManager& DynLibManager::getSingleton(void)
00054     {
00055         return Singleton<DynLibManager>::getSingleton();
00056     }
00057 
00058     DynLibManager::~DynLibManager()
00059     {
00060         // Unload & delete resources in turn
00061         for( ResourceMap::iterator it = mResources.begin(); it != mResources.end(); ++it )
00062         {
00063             it->second->unload();
00064             delete it->second;
00065         }
00066 
00067         // Empty the list
00068         mResources.clear();
00069     }
00070 }
